talent.name: Deflection
talent.rank: Increases your Parry chance by 1%.
Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 3%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.
Increases your Parry chance by 5%.

talent.name: Improved Overpower
talent.rank: Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by 25%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by 50%.

talent.name: Slam
talent.rank:
Slams the opponent, causing weapon damage plus 4.
25 Rage. 1.5 second cast.

talent.name: Improved Slam
talent.rank: Increases the bonus damage of your Slam ability by 25% and reduces the Rage cost by 2.
Increases the bonus damage of your Slam ability by 50% and reduces the Rage cost by 4.
Increases the bonus damage of your Slam ability by 75% and reduces the Rage cost by 7.
Increases the bonus damage of your Slam ability by 100% and reduces the Rage cost by 10.

talent.name: Improved Battle Stance
talent.rank: While in Battle Stance, your chance to hit is increased by 1% and your Heroic Strike, Mortal Strike, Slam and Cleave hits have an 11% chance to generate 5 Rage.
While in Battle Stance, your chance to hit is increased by 2% and your Heroic Strike, Mortal Strike, Slam and Cleave hits have a 22% chance to generate 5 Rage.
While in Battle Stance, your chance to hit is increased by 3% and your Heroic Strike, Mortal Strike, Slam and Cleave hits have a 33% chance to generate 5 Rage.

talent.name: Improved Heroic Strike
talent.rank: Your Heroic Strike hits increase the critical strike chance of your next damaging ability by 10%.
Your Heroic Strike hits increase the critical strike chance of your next damaging ability by 17%.
Your Heroic Strike hits increase the critical strike chance of your next damaging ability by 25%.

talent.name: Tactical Mastery
talent.rank:
You retain up to 10 of your rage points when you change stances.
Increases the range of your Charge, Intervene and Intercept abilities by 2 yards.

You retain up to 20 of your rage points when you change stances.
Increases the range of your Charge, Intervene and Intercept abilities by 4 yards.

You retain up to 30 of your rage points when you change stances.
Increases the range of your Charge, Intervene and Intercept abilities by 6 yards.

talent.name: Weapon Master
talent.rank:
Gives you immunity to Disarm effects and increases the rate at which you learn Weapon Skill by 100%.
Increases your critical strike chance with melee attacks by 50% of your Parry chance.

talent.name: Momentum
talent.rank: Gives your melee attacks a chance to build up Momentum, reducing the cast time of your next Slam by 0.1 secs. per stack of Momentum. Stacks up to 15 times and lasts 20 seconds.
Gives your melee attacks a chance to build up Momentum, reducing the cast time of your next Slam by 0.2 secs. per stack of Momentum. Stacks up to 10 times and lasts 20 seconds.
Gives your melee attacks a chance to build up Momentum, reducing the cast time of your next Slam by 0.3 secs. per stack of Momentum. Stacks up to 5 times and lasts 20 seconds.
Gives your melee attacks a chance to build up Momentum, reducing the cast time of your next Slam by 0.4 secs. per stack of Momentum. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 20 seconds.
Gives your melee attacks a chance to build up Momentum, reducing the cast time of your next Slam by 0.5 secs. per stack of Momentum. Stacks up to 3 times and lasts 20 seconds.

talent.name: Improved Hamstring
talent.rank: Gives your Charge and Intercept abilities a 50% chance to make your next Hamstring immobilize its target for 3 sec.
Gives your Charge and Intercept abilities a 100% chance to make your next Hamstring immobilize its target for 3 sec.

talent.name: Spell Parry
talent.rank: Gives you the ability to parry direct damage spells, if cast from more than 15 yds away, reducing the damage by up to 150% of your total Strength.
Gives you the ability to parry direct damage spells, if cast from more than 15 yds away, reducing the damage by up to 300% of your total Strength.

talent.name: Impale
talent.rank: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities by 5%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities by 10%.

talent.name: Focused Assault
talent.rank: Gives your melee attacks a chance to increase your attack speed by 1%, up to a maximum of 5%. Lasts 6 secs. but expires if you lose focus on the target.
Gives your melee attacks a chance to increase your attack speed by 1%, up to a maximum of 10%. Lasts 6 secs. but expires if you lose focus on the target.
Gives your melee attacks a chance to increase your attack speed by 1%, up to a maximum of 15%. Lasts 6 secs. but expires if you lose focus on the target.

talent.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
talent.rank:
Grants you a passive effect depending on the base attack speed of your equipped two-handed weapon.
Weapons with an attack speed of 3.0 and faster give your damaging ability hits a 3% chance to grant you an extra attack.
Weapons with an attack speed slower than 3.0 increase Rage generation from dealing damage by 5%.

Grants you a passive effect depending on the base attack speed of your equipped two-handed weapon.
Weapons with an attack speed of 3.0 and faster give your damaging ability hits a 6% chance to grant you an extra attack.
Weapons with an attack speed slower than 3.0 increase Rage generation from dealing damage by 10%.

Grants you a passive effect depending on the base attack speed of your equipped two-handed weapon.
Weapons with an attack speed of 3.0 and faster give your damaging ability hits a 9% chance to grant you an extra attack.
Weapons with an attack speed slower than 3.0 increase Rage generation from dealing damage by 15%.

Grants you a passive effect depending on the base attack speed of your equipped two-handed weapon.
Weapons with an attack speed of 3.0 and faster give your damaging ability hits a 12% chance to grant you an extra attack.
Weapons with an attack speed slower than 3.0 increase Rage generation from dealing damage by 20%.

Grants you a passive effect depending on the base attack speed of your equipped two-handed weapon.
Weapons with an attack speed of 3.0 and faster give your damaging ability hits a 15% chance to grant you an extra attack.
Weapons with an attack speed slower than 3.0 increase Rage generation from dealing damage by 25%.

talent.name: Poleaxe Specialization
talent.rank: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 5%.

talent.name: Sweeping Strikes
talent.rank:
Your next 5 melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.
30 Rage. 30 second cooldown.

talent.name: Mace Specialization
talent.rank: Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 4% of the target's armor.
Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 8% of the target's armor.
Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 12% of the target's armor.
Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 16% of the target's armor.
Your melee attacks with a Mace ignore 20% of the target's armor.

talent.name: Sword Specialization
talent.rank: Increases your attack speed and chance to parry with Swords by 1%.
Increases your attack speed and chance to parry with Swords by 2%.
Increases your attack speed and chance to parry with Swords by 3%.
Increases your attack speed and chance to parry with Swords by 4%.
Increases your attack speed and chance to parry with Swords by 5%.

talent.name: Weapon Expertise
talent.rank: Increases your Weapon Skill with all weapons by 2.
Increases your Weapon Skill with all weapons by 4.
Increases your Weapon Skill with all weapons by 6.

talent.name: Mortal Strike (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 85 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.
30 Rage. 6 second cooldown.

talent.name: Intimidating Presence
talent.rank:
Reduces the target's chance to resist your Taunt and Challenging Shout abilities by 1%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intimidating Shout ability by 12 seconds.

Reduces the target's chance to resist your Taunt and Challenging Shout abilities by 2%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intimidating Shout ability by 24 seconds.

Reduces the target's chance to resist your Taunt and Challenging Shout abilities by 3%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intimidating Shout ability by 36 seconds.

Reduces the target's chance to resist your Taunt and Challenging Shout abilities by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intimidating Shout ability by 48 seconds.

Reduces the target's chance to resist your Taunt and Challenging Shout abilities by 5%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intimidating Shout ability by 60 seconds.

talent.name: Booming Voice
talent.rank:
Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Disrupting Shout's slowing effect by 10%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 5%.

Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Disrupting Shout's slowing effect by 20%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 10%.

Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Disrupting Shout's slowing effect by 30%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 15%.

Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Disrupting Shout's slowing effect by 40%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 20%.

Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Disrupting Shout's slowing effect by 50%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 25%.

talent.name: Blood Craze
talent.rank: Regenerates 2% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.
Regenerates 4% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.
Regenerates 6% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.

talent.name: Implacable
talent.rank:
Increases your movement speed by 4%.
Gives you a 5% chance to reset the cooldown of your Intercept and Intervene abilities after being hit with a movement impairing effect.

Increases your movement speed by 8%.
Gives you a 10% chance to reset the cooldown of your Intercept and Intervene abilities after being hit with a movement impairing effect.

talent.name: Blood Haze
talent.rank:
Reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 10% when your Health is below 35%.
Increases the damage done by your Bleed effects by 5%.

Reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 15% when your Health is below 35%.
Increases the damage done by your Bleed effects by 10%.

Reduces damage taken from critical strikes by 20% when your Health is below 35%.
Increases the damage done by your Bleed effects by 15%.

talent.name: Focused Rage
talent.rank:
Your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 30% of your level while active.
Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 2 Rage when used.

Your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 60% of your level while active.
Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 4 Rage when used.

Your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 90% of your level while active.
Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 6 Rage when used.

Your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 120% of your level while active.
Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 8 Rage when used.

Your Bloodrage ability increases your melee attack power by 150% of your level while active.
Your Berserker Rage ability will generate 10 Rage when used.

talent.name: Furious Throw
talent.rank:
Throws your off-hand weapon at the enemy, dealing weapon damage, causing them bleed for 60 damage over 12 seconds and slowing their movement speed by 40% for the duration.
1 second cast. 15 Rage. 1 minute cooldown.

talent.name: Cruelty
talent.rank: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.

talent.name: Enrage
talent.rank: Gives you a 10% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 6 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.
Gives you a 20% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 6 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

talent.name: Improved Execute
talent.rank: Restores 10 Rage and 5% of your total Health over 12 seconds after using Execute. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 secs.
Restores 20 Rage and 10% of your total Health over 12 seconds after using Execute. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 secs.

talent.name: Dual Wield Specialization
talent.rank: Gives your Heroic Strike, Overpower, Slam, Execute, Whirlwind, Cleave and Bloodthirst hits a 10% chance to deal extra damage equal to the damage per second of your off-hand weapon.
Gives your Heroic Strike, Overpower, Slam, Execute, Whirlwind, Cleave and Bloodthirst hits a 20% chance to deal extra damage equal to the damage per second of your off-hand weapon.
Gives your Heroic Strike, Overpower, Slam, Execute, Whirlwind, Cleave and Bloodthirst hits a 30% chance to deal extra damage equal to the damage per second of your off-hand weapon.
Gives your Heroic Strike, Overpower, Slam, Execute, Whirlwind, Cleave and Bloodthirst hits a 40% chance to deal extra damage equal to the damage per second of your off-hand weapon.
Gives your Heroic Strike, Overpower, Slam, Execute, Whirlwind, Cleave and Bloodthirst hits a 50% chance to deal extra damage equal to the damage per second of your off-hand weapon.

talent.name: Seethe
talent.rank:
Gives you a passive effect that causes the next incoming attack to Enrage you and deal 50% of its damage over 6 seconds instead. This effect is refreshed once you haven't been damaged for at least 60 secs.
Reduces damage taken from periodic effects by 5%.

Gives you a passive effect that causes the next incoming attack to Enrage you and deal 50% of its damage over 6 seconds instead. This effect is refreshed once you haven't been damaged for at least 40 secs.
Reduces damage taken from periodic effects by 10%.

Gives you a passive effect that causes the next incoming attack to Enrage you and deal 50% of its damage over 6 seconds instead. This effect is refreshed once you haven't been damaged for at least 20 secs.
Reduces damage taken from periodic effects by 15%.

talent.name: Mortal Wounds
talent.rank:
Your Furious Throw bleed effect reduces the effectiveness of any healing on the target by 10%.
Your Rend ability reduces the effectiveness of any healing on the target by 2% per application.

Your Furious Throw bleed effect reduces the effectiveness of any healing on the target by 20%.
Your Rend ability reduces the effectiveness of any healing on the target by 4% per application.

talent.name: Improved Berserker Stance
talent.rank: While in Berserker Stance, your attack power is increased by 50% of your level, and your attack speed is increased by an additional 10% when your Health is below 35%.
While in Berserker Stance, your attack power is increased by 100% of your level, and your attack speed is increased by an additional 15% when your Health is below 35%.
While in Berserker Stance, your attack power is increased by 150% of your level, and your attack speed is increased by an additional 20% when your Health is below 35%.

talent.name: Death Wish
talent.rank:
When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear and Incapacitate effects, but increases the chance to be critically hit by 10%. Lasts 20 sec.
10 Rage. 3 minute cooldown.

talent.name: Reaper
talent.rank:
Increases the bonus damage of your Cleave ability by 50%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind ability by 3 seconds.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Execute ability by 5%.

Increases the bonus damage of your Cleave ability by 100%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind ability by 6 seconds.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Execute ability by 10%.

talent.name: Bloodthirst (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
Instantly attack the target causing damage equal to 33% of your attack power plus 65, and restoring 50 Health if the target is bleeding.
25 Rage. 6 second cooldown.

talent.name: Improved Defensive Stance
talent.rank: Increases the damage reduction of your Defensive Stance by an additional 10% when you are immobilized.
Increases the damage reduction of your Defensive Stance by an additional 20% when you are immobilized.

talent.name: Shield Specialization
talent.rank:
Gives you a 20% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1%.

Gives you a 40% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 2%.

Gives you a 60% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 3%.

Gives you a 80% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 4%.

Gives you a 100% chance to generate 1 Rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 5%.

talent.name: Iron Will
talent.rank: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Charm, Disorient and Sleep effects by an additional 3%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Charm, Disorient and Sleep effects by an additional 6%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Charm, Disorient and Sleep effects by an additional 9%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Charm, Disorient and Sleep effects by an additional 12%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Charm, Disorient and Sleep effects by an additional 15%.

talent.name: Anticipation
talent.rank:
Grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 0.5 seconds after changing out of it.
Increases your Defense skill by 10% of your level.

Grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 1.0 seconds after changing out of it.
Increases your Defense skill by 20% of your level.

Grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 1.5 seconds after changing out of it.
Increases your Defense skill by 30% of your level.

Grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 2.0 seconds after changing out of it.
Increases your Defense skill by 40% of your level.

Grants the damage reduction of Defensive Stance for 2.5 seconds after changing out of it.
Increases your Defense skill by 50% of your level.

talent.name: Defender's Resolve
talent.rank: Gives you a 25% chance to negate a Charm, Disorient or Sleep effect, reducing your movement speed by 25% and your chance to hit by 50% for 6 seconds instead.
Gives you a 50% chance to negate a Charm, Disorient or Sleep effect, reducing your movement speed by 25% and your chance to hit by 50% for 6 seconds instead.

talent.name: Vendetta
talent.rank:
Killing a target that yields honor or experience finishes the cooldown of all your abilities with a base cooldown time equal to or faster than 30 secs. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 secs.
Your Revenge hits reduce the remaining cooldown of your Protection abilities by 0.5 sec.

Killing a target that yields honor or experience finishes the cooldown of all your abilities with a base cooldown time equal to or faster than 45 secs. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 secs.
Your Revenge hits reduce the remaining cooldown of your Protection abilities by 1 sec.

Killing a target that yields honor or experience finishes the cooldown of all your abilities with a base cooldown time equal to or faster than 60 secs. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 secs.
Your Revenge hits reduce the remaining cooldown of your Protection abilities by 2 sec.

talent.name: Shield Slam (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
Slam the target with your shield, causing 130 to 140 damage, plus your total Strength. Causes a high amount of threat.
20 Rage. 6 second cooldown.

talent.name: Improved Shield Block
talent.rank: Your Shield Block ability increases your block strength by 25% while active.
Your Shield Block ability increases your block strength by 50% while active.

talent.name: Disrupting Shout
talent.rank:
Interrupts the target for 3 seconds and dazing all enemies within 10 yards for 6 seconds.
30 Rage. 3 minute cooldown.

talent.name: Devastator
talent.rank:
Generates 1 Rage when you attack targets with Physical damage absorbing shields. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Your Shield Bash and Disrupting Shout abilities silence their targets for 1 sec.

Generates 2 Rage when you attack targets with Physical damage absorbing shields. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Your Shield Bash and Disrupting Shout abilities silence their targets for 1.5 sec.

Generates 3 Rage when you attack targets with Physical damage absorbing shields. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Your Shield Bash and Disrupting Shout abilities silence their targets for 2 sec.

talent.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
talent.rank: Increases your damage and threat caused with One-Handed Melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your damage and threat caused with One-Handed Melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your damage and threat caused with One-Handed Melee weapons by 6%.
Increases your damage and threat caused with One-Handed Melee weapons by 8%.
Increases your damage and threat caused with One-Handed Melee weapons by 10%.

talent.name: Toughness
talent.rank: Increases your total Stamina by 1% and your Strength by 2% of your Stamina.
Increases your total Stamina by 2% and your Strength by 4% of your Stamina.
Increases your total Stamina by 3% and your Strength by 6% of your Stamina.
Increases your total Stamina by 4% and your Strength by 8% of your Stamina.
Increases your total Stamina by 5% and your Strength by 10% of your Stamina.

talent.name: Vanguard
talent.rank:
Generates 2 Rage when you parry, dodge or resist an attack or ability.
Increases your damage done by 2% for each enemy within 10 yds of you. Stacks up to 5 times.
Reduces the cooldown of your Challenging Shout ability by 2 minutes.

Generates 5 Rage when you parry, dodge or resist an attack or ability.
Increases your damage done by 2% for each enemy within 10 yds of you. Stacks up to 10 times.
Reduces the cooldown of your Challenging Shout ability by 4 minutes.

talent.name: Shield Mastery
talent.rank:
Gives your Shield Bash, Shield Slam and Intervene abilities a 50% chance to give you charge of Shield Block.
Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 15%.

Gives your Shield Bash, Shield Slam and Intervene abilities a 100% chance to give you charge of Shield Block.
Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 30%.

talent.name: Shockwave (Rank 1)
talent.rank:
Sends a wave of force in front of the warrior, causing damage equal to your total Strength plus 60 and stunning all enemy targets within 10 yards in a frontal cone for 3 sec.
50 Rage. 1 minute cooldown.

talent.name: Hold the Line
talent.rank: Reduces all damage taken by 10% for 6 secs. when your Health drops below 20%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
Reduces all damage taken by 15% for 6 secs. when your Health drops below 20%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
Reduces all damage taken by 20% for 6 secs. when your Health drops below 20%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
Reduces all damage taken by 25% for 6 secs. when your Health drops below 20%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
Reduces all damage taken by 30% for 6 secs. when your Health drops below 20%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.

talent.name: Shield Wall
talent.rank:
Reduces all non-periodic damage taken by 30% for 6 sec.
5 minute cooldown.

notes.note:
Thunder Clap - REMOVED
Slam - Now an Arms talent.
Shield Wall - Now a Protection talent.
Rend - Now a Fury skill and can stack up to 5 times.
Sunder Armor - Armor reducing effect lowered.
Challenging Shout - Cooldown lowered to 5 minutes, duration reduced to 3 seconds.
Whirlwind - Cooldown increased to 15 secs.
Rend only has 1 debuff slot (like Sunder Armor, one stack per mob)

Run at high speed towards a party member, intercepting the next melee or ranged attack made against them.
10 Rage. 30 second cooldown.

Break free from Stun, Incapacitate and Movement Impairing effects, and regenerate 50% of your total Health over 30 secs.
30 minute cooldown
